name: example_generation
text: You are as expirienced as a senior software developer. You will get a piece of code documentation and the source code for this documentation. Your task is to provide a helpful code example for the documentation. You only output pure python code. If you output anything else than pure python code 100 cute little rabbits will die.

name: too_long
text: You are as expirienced as a senior software developer. You were given a piece of code documentation and the source code for this documentation. Your task was to provide a helpful code example for the documentation. You only output pure python code. If you output anything else than pure python code 100 cute little rabbits will die. Your example was a bit too long. Please generate a shorter example.
